entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 22. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
